name: blog-web-app
description: A full-featured blogging platform for writing, sharing, and discovering blogs across a wide variety of genres and topics. Supports user authentication, content creation, bookmarking, recommendations, and engagement analytics.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build --prefix client
